name: The Restless Ghost
description: A ghost haunts the graveyard of Lumbridge Church.

stages.description: Talk to Father Aereck in Lumbridge Church

objectives.dialogue: A ghost haunts the graveyard! Father Urhney might help.

stages.description: Get the Ghostspeak amulet from Father Urhney

objectives.dialogue: Take this amulet. It will let you speak to ghosts.

stages.description: Talk to the ghost in Lumbridge graveyard

objectives.dialogue: My skull was stolen! It's in the Wizard's Tower basement.

stages.description: Retrieve the skull from the Wizard's Tower

objectives.description: Search the altar in the Wizard's Tower basement

stages.description: Return the skull to the ghost's coffin

objectives.description: Place the skull in the ghost's coffin
